snippet: Apple on Wednesday released the latest version of its Mac operating system, OS X Mountain Lion. Some tech reviewers had early access to the software, and most of them agree that it's worth the $20 it costs to upgrade.

snippet: Boeing and Caterpillar posted gains on surprisingly strong earnings reports, but Apple shares fell, and bad news on housing sales kept the market down.
abstract: Stock market lacks direction due to strong earnings from some companies and weak ones from others.

To the standard rectangular boxes that makes up the bulk of the wireless mini-speaker market, HMDX Audio has responded with Jam, a $50 cylinder of sound to pump out tunes from your phone, tablet or computer by Bluetooth connection.
